AttributeAdjustmentCondition.name: AttributeAdjustmentCondition
AttributeAdjustmentCondition.description: Represents the condition applied to an attribute that determines the price of a product or service being sold.

AttributeBasedAdjRuleId.description: Specifies the attribute adjustment rule record for which the condition is to be applied.

AttributeDefinitionId.description: Specifies the attribute definition record for which the condition is to be applied.

BooleanValue.description: Specifies the boolean value of the operator.

DateTimeValue.description: The date time value of the attribute.

DateValue.description: The date value of the attribute.

DoubleValue.description: The double value of the attribute.

IntegerValue.description: The integer value of the attribute.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last referred to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

Name.description: Name of the attribute adjustment condition.

ProductId.description: The ID of the product associated with the attribute adjustment condition.

StringValue.description: The string value of the attribute.

UsageType.description: The type of record where the attribute adjustment condition is used.
